text: Rui Manuel César Costa (; born 29 March 1972) is a Portuguese former professional footballer who is the 34th president of sports club S.L. Benfica. He also succeeded Luís Filipe Vieira as president of the club's SAD board of directors. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== "Matches in European Cups". RSSSF. Retrieved 8 July 2012.
